title: Remake Timer Extension
body:
Hi,

Remake needs its timer slightly increased.

A player can count as in game until nearly 4 minutes, and when the game figure's they've  disconnected the  remake is no longer available.

Who else would like to see the remake timer increased to accommodate this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Iit seems you've gotten lost somewhere on the Rift and posted this in the wrong board :( This board is for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.

Your thread would be better suited for [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy).
Thank you, I just thought since the remake mechanics are coded, it's a technical issue.
